articles.title: Pleas for federal funding to help kids like Luna access a life-saving treatment overseas
articles.description: Parents are hoping the government could help with millions of dollars so they can travel to access the drug while Australia's regulators consider its use at home.
articles.content:
• In short: Desperate parents of children with rare forms of cancer are pleading with the federal government for funding to access a drug that helps prevent the disease returning.
